rows.title: How to test multiple variables for equality against a single value?

36:
<p>If you want to use if, else statements following is another solution:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">myList = []
aList = [<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>]

<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> l <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> aList:
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> l==<span class="hljs-number">0</span>: myList.append(<span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span> l==<span class="hljs-number">1</span>: myList.append(<span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span> l==<span class="hljs-number">2</span>: myList.append(<span class="hljs-string">'e'</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span> l==<span class="hljs-number">3</span>: myList.append(<span class="hljs-string">'f'</span>)

<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(myList)
</code></pre>

<p>To test multiple variables with one single value: <code>if 1 in {a,b,c}:</code></p>

<p>To test multiple values with one variable: <code>if a in {1, 2, 3}:</code></p>

<p>you can develop it through two ways</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">    <span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">compareVariables</span>(<span class="hljs-params">x,y,z</span>):
        mylist = []
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> x==<span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">or</span> y==<span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">or</span> z==<span class="hljs-number">0</span>:
            mylist.append(<span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span>  x==<span class="hljs-number">1</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">or</span> y==<span class="hljs-number">1</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">or</span> z==<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:
            mylist.append(<span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span>  x==<span class="hljs-number">2</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">or</span> y==<span class="hljs-number">2</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">or</span> z==<span class="hljs-number">2</span>:
            mylist.append(<span class="hljs-string">'e'</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span>  x==<span class="hljs-number">3</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">or</span> y==<span class="hljs-number">3</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">or</span> z==<span class="hljs-number">3</span>:
            mylist.append(<span class="hljs-string">'f'</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
            <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"wrong input value!"</span>)
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'first:'</span>,mylist)

        compareVariables(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>)
</code></pre>
<p>Or</p>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">    <span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">compareVariables</span>(<span class="hljs-params">x,y,z</span>):
        mylist = []
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> (x,y,z):
             mylist.append(<span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-number">1</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> (x,y,z):
             mylist.append(<span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-number">2</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> (x,y,z):
             mylist.append(<span class="hljs-string">'e'</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-number">3</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> (x,y,z):
             mylist.append(<span class="hljs-string">'f'</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
             <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"wrong input value!"</span>)
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'second:'</span>,mylist)

        compareVariables(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>)
</code></pre>
